title: Login Bug
body:
Anyone has experienced a login bug where the username and the password spaces disappear altogether if not clicked upon?
Meaning if i click anywhere else but the squares username and password or try to minimalize the client they disappear and as a result there is no option to login at all. 
Worth mentioning that this is happening when i connect my pc to my LCD TV.

replies.body:
Strange. That never happened to me.
> Worth mentioning that this is happening when i connect my pc to my LCD TV.

I don't think that using your TV as a display would matter. Other than using it as a second display to extend the Desktop. Try launching the client from your primary display and login from there.
